alert.note: Alert for Pike; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 8:36PM EDT until July 02 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Pike County in west central Georgia... Northwestern Upson County in west central Georgia... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 836 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Molena, or 10 miles northwest of Thomaston, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Molena, Sunset Village, Crest, Sunnyside, Atwater, Lifsey Springs and Hannahs Mill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
